resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105102</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105102</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805973918</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Christian Aid: Secondary Teacher's Resources</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Christliches Hilfsmittel: Betriebsmittel Des
Sekundärlehrers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aide Chrétienne : Les Ressources du 
Professeur Secondaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dae (dispositivo automático de entrada) 
Christian: Recursos Do Professor Secundário</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sussidio Cristiano: Risorse Dell'Insegnante 
Secondario</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χριστιανική ενίσχυση: Στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς του 
δευτεροβάθμιου δασκάλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ayuda Cristiana: Recursos Del Profesor 
Secundario</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Download or order easy-to-use Secondary assemblies, classroom activities and games to help students engage with world issues and reflect on their own role as global citizens.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Download oder bedienungsfreundliche 
Sekundärordnungen, Klassenzimmeraktivitäten und Spiele, zum der 
Kursteilnehmer zu helfen, in den Weltausgaben sich zu engagieren und 
auf ihrer eigenen Rolle als globale Bürger sich zu reflektieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Assemblages de téléchargement ou de commande, 
activités faciles à utiliser de salle de classe et jeux secondaires 
pour aider des étudiants à engager dans des issues du monde et à 
réfléchir sur leur propre rôle en tant que citoyens globaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conjuntos do download ou da ordem, atividades 
easy-to-use da sala de aula e jogos secundários para ajudar a 
estudantes acoplar com edições do mundo e refletir em seu próprio 
papel como cidadãos globais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Complessivi di ordine o di trasferimento dal 
sistema centrale verso i satelliti, attività di facile impiego 
dell'aula e giochi secondari per aiutare gli allievi a agganciarsi con
le edizioni del mondo ed a riflettere sul loro proprio ruolo come 
cittadini globali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταφορτώστε ή διατάξτε τις εύχρηστες δευτεροβάθμιες 
συμβολικές γλώσσες, τις δραστηριότητες τάξεων και τα παιχνίδια 
για να βοηθήσετε τους σπουδαστές να δεσμεύσουν με τα παγκόσμια 
ζητήματα και να απεικονίσουν στο ρόλο τους ως σφαιρικούς πολίτες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ensamblajes de la transferencia directa o de la 
orden, actividades fáciles de utilizar de la sala de clase y juegos 
secundarios para ayudar a estudiantes a enganchar con las ediciones 
del mundo y a reflejar en su propio papel como ciudadanos globales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commercio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχείρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Negocio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805973918</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105102</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/christian-aid-secondary-teacher-s-resources</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
